Public NotInheritable Class OutAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OutAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示資料應從被呼叫端封送處理至呼叫端。

span.span: Indicates that data should be marshaled from callee back to caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至參數中。You can apply this attribute to parameters. 是選擇性的。The is optional. COM interop 支援的屬性，並只平台叫用。The attribute is supported for COM interop and platform invoke only. 如果沒有明確設定，interop 封送處理器會假設規則根據參數類型、 參考或值，是否傳遞的參數和型別是否 blittable 或非 blittable。In the absence of explicit settings, the interop marshaler assumes rules based on the parameter type, whether the parameter is passed by reference or by value, and whether the type is blittable or non-blittable. 比方說，類別一律假定為 In/Out，而且假設的傳值方式傳遞的字串陣列中。For example, the class is always assumed to be In/Out and an array of strings passed by value is assumed to be In. 僅向外行為絕不會是預設的封送處理行為的參數。Out-only behavior is never a default marshaling behavior for parameters. 您可以套用以將 In/Out 行為變更為僅向外行為，相當於使用的參考所傳遞的值和參考類型`out`C# 中的關鍵字。You can apply the to value and reference types passed by reference to change In/Out behavior to Out-only behavior, which is equivalent to using the `out` keyword in C#. 比方說，為僅向外，可以變更以傳值，做為僅在參數預設會封送處理的陣列。For example, arrays passed by value, marshaled as In-only parameters by default, can be changed to Out-only. 不過，此行為不會永遠提供預期的語意時類型包括所有 blittable 項目或欄位，因為 interop 封送處理器會使用釘選。However, the behavior does not always provide expected semantics when the types include all-blittable elements or fields because the interop marshaler uses pinning. 如果您不在意將資料傳遞至被呼叫端，則僅向外封送處理可以提供較佳的效能，對於非 blittable 類型。If you do not care about passing data into the callee, Out-only marshaling can provide better performance for non-blittable types. 結合和是特別有用時，套用至陣列和格式化，非 blittable 類型。Combining the and is particularly useful when applied to arrays and formatted, non-blittable types. 呼叫端看到只有當您套用這兩個屬性，這些類型對被呼叫端的變更。Callers see the changes a callee makes to these types only when you apply both attributes. 由於這些類型需要複製封送處理期間，您可以使用和以減少不必要的複本。Since these types require copying during marshaling, you can use and to reduce unnecessary copies. 如需有關的作用封送處理行為，請參閱[方向屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/241ac5b5-928e-4969-8f58-1dbc048f9ea2)。For more information on the effect of on marshaling behavior, see [Directional Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/241ac5b5-928e-4969-8f58-1dbc048f9ea2). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用和至平台叫用會將陣列傳遞做為參數的原型。The following example shows how to apply the and to a platform invoke prototype that passes an array as a parameter. 方向屬性的組合可讓呼叫端看到被呼叫端所做的變更。The combination of directional attributes allows the caller to see the changes made by the callee. [!code-cpp[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/CPP/inout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/CS/inout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Interop InOutParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Interop InOutParameters/VB/inout.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
